name: FPS Battle (2.1)
description:
This is a 2 years old project i couldn't continue scripting due to the loss of all of my files related to this game, so don't expext any updates.
By the way the respawn menu is broken so dying in a campaign level will make you respawn in skirmish mode.
No major flaws detected other than this one.
Have fun and stay frosty.
